5. Horizontal section of a large disk of  complex type, through
the intermediate layer, showing various irregularities in
the formation of the concentric zones:- 30 diam.
6,7,8,9, Portions of the surface of large <s>dis</s> fossil disks of
complex type, showing varieties in the size and form
of the superficial cells:- 35 diam.
10. Margin of a <s>fossil</s> zone of a fossil disk of complex type,
showing inosculation of columnar cells:- 35 diam.
11. Inner side of a Zone of a fossil disk of complex type,
separated from that which it surrounded by a fracture
along the line junction; showing the fissures leading to
the columnar cells:- 35 diam.
12. Portion of margin of recent disk of complex type:- 35 diam.
13. Similar portion of another disk, with <s>showing</s> the last zone laid open, <s>and</s> showing a de-
ficiency of the partitions between its columnar cells:
- 35 diam.
